mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_user_qhzx_verify (id,id_no, trans_no, batch_no, sub_product_inc, reason_code, name, mobile_no, entity_auth_code, entity_auth_date, seq_no,total_info_id, is_real_identity, is_owne_mobile, error_info, create_time, update_time) values(#{id},#{idNo},#{transNo},#{batchNo},#{subProductInc},#{reasonCode},#{name},#{mobileNo}, #{entityAuthCode},#{entityAuthDate},#{seqNo},#{totalInfoId},#{isRealIdentity},#{isOwnerMobile},#{errorInfo},#{createTime},#{updateTime})
mapper.select: select id,id_no,name,is_real_identity from t_user_qhzx_verify where id_no=#{idNo}
